title: The Theory of Everything
author: Stephen Hawking
description: An overview of cosmology and black holes.

title: Cosmos
author: Carl Sagan
description: A comprehensive journey through the universe, exploring its origins, evolution, and our place within it.

title: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
author: Yuval Noah Harari
description: A comprehensive history of humankind, exploring our origins, evolution, and our place within it.

title: Dune
author: Frank Herbert
description: Set in the distant future amidst a feudal intergalactic society.

title: The Lord of the Rings
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
description: An epic high-fantasy adventure set in Middle-earth.

title: The Great Gatsby
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
description: A story of love, greed, and the American Dream.

title: Kafka On The Shore
author: Haruki Murakami
description: Explores the two systems that drive the way we think.

title: The Color of Magic
author: Terry Pratchett
description: A fantasy novel about a young man who becomes a wizard.
